clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of Quizartinib in Participants With Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML) FLT3 Internal Tandem Duplication (FLT3/ITD) Mutation
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 2 Open-label, Single-arm Study of Quizartinib (AC220) Monotherapy in Japanese Patients With FLT3-ITD Positive Refractory or Relapsed Acute Myeloid Leukemia

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 2, multi-center, open-label, single-arm study to evaluate the efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics of quizartinib monotherapy in Japanese subjects with FLT3-ITD positive refractory or relapsed acute myeloid leukemia.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 2 and on: Day 1, within about 12 months
primary_outcome.description: The composite complete remission (CRc) rate in quizartinib monotherapy in Japanese patients with FLT3-ITD positive refractory or relapsed acute myeloid leukemia (AML) is based on bone marrow findings, absolute neutrophil count and platelet count.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants achieving best response
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 2 and on: Day 1, within about 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: There are several categories for best response. The number of participants achieving each of them will be determined.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants achieving best response
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 2 and on: Day 1, within about 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants achieving each categorical best response

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with overall survival (OS)
secondary_outcome.description: OS from registration (enrollment) until death from any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with event free survival (EFS)
secondary_outcome.description: EFS from registration until documented disease progression/treatment failure, relapse or death from any cause, whichever comes first

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with leukemia-free survival (LFS)
secondary_outcome.description: LFS from the first documented response of <spell out acronym please> (CRc) until documented relapse or death from any cause, whichever comes first

arm_group.description: Once-daily repeated oral administration until there is no longer clinical benefit from therapy, or until unacceptable toxicity occurs.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- AML patients in first relapse or refractory after all prior therapy
- Presence of the FLT3-ITD activating mutation in bone marrow or peripheral blood
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status (PS) of 0 to 2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of acute promyelocytic leukemia
- AML secondary to prior chemotherapy for other neoplasms.
- Persistent, clinically significant > Grade 1 non-hematologic toxicity from prior AML therapy
- Prior treatment with a FLT3 targeted therapy
- Active infection not well controlled by antibacterial, antifungal and/or antiviral therapy

clinical_study.keyword: Positive refractory or relapsed acute myeloid leukemia
